description: Ensure GDPR compliance with a Consent Form.
name: Personal Data Processing Consent Form

steps.title: Personal Data Processing Consent Form
steps.text: This consent form is used to obtain explicit consent from individuals for the processing of their personal data for [purpose]. The collected data may include [description of data]. By signing this form, the individual agrees to grant consent for the specified duration.

blocks.label: Full Name
blocks.help: Enter the full name of the individual providing consent.
blocks.name: name

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Provide the email address of the individual providing consent.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Provide the phone number of the individual providing consent.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Address
blocks.help: Provide the postal address of the individual providing consent.
blocks.name: address

blocks.label: Consent Option
blocks.help: Either consent or withhold consent for the processing of personal data.
blocks.name: consent

blocks.label: Signature
blocks.help: Sign to confirm the authenticity of the consent.
blocks.name: signature
